Plot: Hunter Wild just wants to get through her last year at the secret Helios-Ra Academy. To do so, she'll have to betray her grandfather, date a vampire and possibly take down the entire League - all before the end of term.
Characters: Lia, Connor Drake, Spencer, Solange Drake, Nicholas Drake, Kieran Black, Lucy Hamilton, Sebastian Drake, Quinn Drake, Isabeau St. Croix, Logan Drake, Hunter Wild, Chloe Traeger, Duncan Drake, Marcus Drake, Liam Drake, Helena Drake, Geoffery Drake
